actions.text: On agreeing to the Skelton amendment (A017) Agreed to by recorded vote: 270 - 155 (Roll no. 189).

description: Amendment deletes language which prohibits any funding for combat or peacekeeping operations in the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia after Sept. 30, 1999; and retains language which requires the President to request supplemental appropriations in order to conduct combat or peacekeeping operations in the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia.
purpose: An amendment no. 19 and printed in H. Rept. 106-175 to strike section 1006 (a) prohibiting any funding for combat or peacekeeping operations in the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia.
